description.en: Formerly known as Dash Platinum (DASHP), Platinum is a modern crypto-currency with security features supporting high-speed transactions, minimum rate and transactions P2P (peer-to-peer) 100% decentralized, offering ease of anonymity through Masternodes hosted around the world, where no central organization or entity controls the currency, ensuring the possibility of storing, send and receive coins anonymously and securely through the use of mobile and desktop wallets both online and between person with unique and minimal transaction fees.
